author: Parkside-Cottage
title: Love the location
text:
The location of this hotel is fantastic! Easy to walk to many sites. The staff is wonderful. The breakfast at the hotel restaurant which happens to also be a Jamie Oliver restaurant is worth every penny. The best eggs I have ever eaten on a buffet...usually stay away from eggs on a buffet but these are perfectly cooked not too dry or weird tasting...almost as good as made to order.
There was work going on during the day which made it difficult to work I appreciated the apology from the staff.
